segments.text: Hello , Mary . Why are you standing here in the cold wind ?

segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Going for a walk in such a cold weather ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I always like to go for a walk before a supper .
segments.speaker: S2
